item.title: DevOps/GitOps: DevOps95 Columbia 2020 : Kubernetes : Getting Started
item.description: Design by - Venkatt Guhesan DevOps/GitOps: DevOps95 / DevOps Columbia / 2020 DevOps Days (DevOpsDays.org) is a global phenomenon going on each year. This year due to COVID-19 lock down, the event was hosted online and in partnership with various meet-ups in the I-95 (interstate 95) corridor. The idea of a DevOps95 grew out of the series of towns and suburbs connecting on the interstate I-95 route on East-Coast. It is an one-day virtual meet-up (on Zoom) where industry leaders from GitOps and DevOps shared their knowledge with others.
